channel.title: Talks By Merlin R. Lybbert
channel.description: General Conference talks by Merlin R. Lybbert.

item.title: A Latter-day Samaritan
item.description: My dear brothers and sisters, there is a feeling of deep appreciation in my soul this afternoon as we worship together. On behalf of the members of the Church in Asia, where we are now serving, I extend their love to President Benson and to the other

item.title: The Special Status of Children
item.description: In a day when one of “the greatest problem[s] in our society is the abandonment of children through the abandonment of parental leadership” (Richard Lloyd Anderson, Salt Lake City: Deseret Book Co., 1983, p. 354), the First Presidency has asked that
